meanings.definition: An amount of money or other aid granted to a student, as for the purpose of attending a college.
meanings.sent1: She received a scholarships to help pay for her tuition.
meanings.sent2: Many students apply for scholarships to afford their education.
meanings.sent3: The scholarships danced happily into her bank account.
meanings.sent4: The scholarships were a golden ticket to higher education.
meanings.sent5: Winning the scholarships felt like a dream come true.

meanings.definition: The position or status of such a student.
meanings.sent1: His scholarships as a student athlete opened many doors for him.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her scholarships as a top student in the class.
meanings.sent3: The scholarships strutted around campus like a VIP.
meanings.sent4: In the academic world, scholarships are like crowns on students' heads.
meanings.sent5: Achieving scholarships elevated her status among her peers.
